content:
We know that documenting everything about OCPN inners is a huge task. Meanwhile, to my surprise, I have found ChatGPT really helpful . It must, of course be treated with caution. The presentation of the output is excellent. Here is a good example.

Screenshot-2024-02-16-at-12.51.38.png

However, " In OpenCPN, what are the shortcut keys?" gave very nicely laid out results but with many wrong.

Maybe we could make the right information more visible to ChatGPT and hide the wrong stuff?
